As you may or may not know, I travel for Feedster to our San Francisco offices quite regularly.  And the hotel I've been staying at, the Hotel Milano, has, ahem, connectivity woes:

Approximate round trip times in milli-seconds:

Now, just to be fair, this is with my 1 laptop on which WIFI actually works.  So here's the criteria for a hotel recommendation:

  • Close (walkable) to the Feedster Offices at 116 New Montgomery
  • Connectivity either wired or wireless (preferable) that just plain works
  • Nothing monstrously expensive; one of the reasons that the Milano is attractive is that its not all that expensive ($140 / night)

Any recommendations out there?
